properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 7 at 8:27AM PST until February 8 at 9:49PM PST by NWS Pendleton OR
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Pendleton has issued a flood
warning for the following rivers in Washington...

Yakima River near Parker affecting Yakima County

...Forecast flooding changed from Moderate to Major severity for the
following rivers in Oregon...Washington...
Grande Ronde River at Troy affecting Wallowa and Asotin Counties

The National Weather Service in Pendleton has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Yakima River near Parker.
* from this evening to Saturday evening.
* At 7:00 AM Friday, the stage was 7.9 feet.
* Flood stage is 10.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by tonight and continue to rise
to near 10.4 feet by early tomorrow. The river will fall below
flood stage by Sunday morning.
properties.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown. Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility
vehicles through flooded areas. The water may be too deep to allow
for safe passage. As little as one foot of water on the road can move
most vehicles off the road.
